title: pbe help pls
body: well uhmm because my account is set standard and 2 other accounts of mine which i was gonna make into guest ones that werent even fully set up so i cant even log in and its liek they dont exist set as admin accounts i dotn have admin permissions so i cant download the pbe client i found a way do download normal league without admin  but i cant seem to find a way to download my  client for pbe i type my password for admin but nothing happens at all and im stuck on a crappy screen and nothing happens can someoen help pls just pls

replies.body: I'm not sure I fully understand what's going wrong here, are these accounts you're talking about League accounts, or it almost sounds like you're asking for help with Windows profiles? Sorry for not understanding, but try to explain what's going on a little more and I can try to help out!
its about like windows  admin and standard accounts is there a way to download pbe client without admin permissions

Ahhhh so yea, you're going to need to make sure you're installing League with admin rights as well as running the game itself as admin. If you don't have those privileges you may need to reach out to whoever has that access to get that setup.
